USA: Estêvão Gomes landed in the neighborhood of Chesapeake Bay and took formal possession on behalf of the King of Spain. The massacre was revenged by Mendez some time afterward.
Taiwan: Some merchants from Fujian are able to speak Formosan languages
Sweden: The First Dalecarlian Rebellion occurs in parallel with an attempt made by Christina Gyllenstierna and Sören Norby to conquer the Swedish throne.
Poland: Signing of the Treaty of Kraków
Philippine: Spain sends an expedition under Juan Garcia Jofre de Loaysa to the Philippines. The Loaysa Expedition failed
Germany: German Peasants' War: The war ended in the defeat of the peasant army.
Prussian Homage: Grand Master Albert of the Teutonic Order resigned his position and was appointed duke of Prussia by the Polish king Sigismund I the Old.
France: Battle of Pavia. Francis is defeated by Imperial forces under Charles V and captured.
Estonia: The Teutonic Order is secularized and the Livonian Order becomes de facto independent.
Colombia: Rodrigo de Bastidas founded the village of Santa Marta
Cambodia: The royal Khmer court moves to Longvek.
